title: Conduct Workplace Safety Inspection
description: A safety officer conducts a planned inspection of a maintenance workshop using a digital checklist on a tablet.

tasks.description: Open the 'Workshop Inspection Checklist' on the tablet.
tasks.expected_outcome: The correct digital inspection form is loaded.

tasks.description: Walk through the workshop and complete the checklist, inspecting items like fire extinguishers, machine guarding, and housekeeping.
tasks.expected_outcome: The inspection is completed, and a few minor issues are identified, such as a blocked fire exit.

tasks.description: Log a corrective action for the blocked fire exit and assign it to the workshop supervisor for immediate resolution.
tasks.expected_outcome: A corrective action is created and tracked in the safety management system.
